title: POCO M2 (Slate Blue, 64 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Type C Cable, SIM Eject Tool, User Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 70% NTSC Ratio, 1500:1 Contrast Ratio, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, 2.5D Glass
product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP + 8MP + 5MP + 2MP Rear Camera Setup, Main Camera (13MP, AF, 5P, 1.12μm, f/2.2, FOV 75.2 Degree) + UW Camera (8MP, FF, 5P, 1.12μm, f/2.2, 5P, FOV 118.2 Degree) + Micro Camera (5MP + 1.75μm, f/2.4, 3P, FOV 83 Degree) + Portrait Camera (2MP, FF, 1.75μm, f/2.4, 3P, FOV 83 Degree), Slow Motion Support
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8MP Selfie Camera Setup, f/2.05 Aperture, 1.12um Pixel Size
product_specification.Other Features: eMMC Internal Storage, IR Blaster, 18W Charging Support, Rear Fingerprint Scanner
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Pixel Perfect Display: With the 16.58 cm (6.53) FHD+ 1080p Full Screen Display with 394 PPI, you can watch your favourite characters come alive on the screen with accurate details and lifelike clarity.
product_description.Shift Gears Seamlessly: Multitasking and app switching is so swift and seamless that you can switch from attending zoom calls and browsing the web to gaming online effortlessly.

This phone is average, not so good not so bad. Let me give you pros and cons.
Pros:
1. Amazing build quality
2. battery life is excellent.
3. Display is very good.

6. face unlock works smooth.

1. Selfie camera is useless, even my 5 years old previous moto g4 plus had a better selfie camera.
2. Miui 12 sucks in terms of ads, junk apps which you can't uninstall. Most people would love all the themes, wallpapers and all, but I love stock clean android. I even noticed some bugs. Some inbuilt features not working. Xiaomi really need to done some work on their OS.

6. Also the back side fingerprint sensor is badly placed. But I works smooth.
7. And its heavy, i mean my fingers started paining only after 2 days of usage.

Software:

The device comes with android 10 based miui 11, out of box. Miui12 based on android 10 is available for update immediately. The OS is kind of ad free, unlike regular miui..Almost nice experience with this..

Hardware:

6GB Ram handles almost every processing and multitasking with ease..

Display is the best part here. Top notch fullhd display at unbelievable price point. Definitely premium feature.

There is a quad cam setup.. 13+8+5+2 mp. Not up to the mark. I believe it's the software, not utilizing its potential. Might be fixed with a dedicated camera update.. Let's hope so..

Helio G80 does amazing job.. No stuttering or lag whatsoever is the load you bring in. Thanks also to the 6GB of ram.

5000mah Battery does its job. Gives you 1.5Day of juice with moderate usage scenario.

Bit heavy (BIT).. Underperforming camera could be a couple of negatives . But at this price point 6GB Ram , Full Hd display and butter smooth performance is super cool.

pros.Rear camera: The 13MP + 8MP + 5MP + 2MP rear camera setup is awesome and produces quality photos.
pros.5000 mAh battery: This phone comes with a 5000 mAh battery which is a beast and lasts for more than one day on moderate use.
pros.16.58 cm (6.53) FHD+ 1080p Full Screen D: This phone comes with a top notch FHD+ 1080p full screen display which is amazing at this price range.
pros.Performance: The MediaTek Helio G80 Octa-core CPU processor alongwith 6GB of RAM gives good processing speed and optimized performance.

cons.Front camera: The 8MP front camera is average and is very poor in quality.

summary.verdict: The POCO M2 is a decent phone at an affordable price with good features.
summary.Additional Information: Supports Freefire in ultra graphics mode, Dual 4g Volte support, 51GB free storage.
